org.bch.security.oauth.server

Class OAuthServerFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bch.security.oauth.server.OAuthServerFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.servlet.Filter

    public class OAuthServerFilter
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.servlet.Filter
    Filter for the oauth server. Expects BASIC authentication, which is validated through the standard LoginModule
    Author:
    CHIP-IHL
